pages.text: It can be difficult to maintain a $(l:concepts/pacifism)pacifist$() life-style while maintaining a steady supply of feathers in order to make arrows.$(br2)Before you gain access to the $(l:rituals/ritual_aniaml_harvest)Animal Harvest$() ritual, these living arrows will serve you well.$(br2)$(info) In addition to acting as a regular arrow, living arrows do slightly more damage.
